revised_title: Experimental Transmission of Goitre from Man to Animals: A Study on Goats
tldr: Researchers conducted experiments to study the transmission of goitre from humans to animals, specifically goats. They contaminated the drinking water of the goats with sterilized soil mixed with the feces of goitrous individuals. The results showed that 50% of the goats developed goitre, indicating that goitre could be transmitted through contaminated water. The study also found that earthworms were not involved in the spread of the disease.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Physiology and Pathology
